title: Product Manager - AI Ethics
description: Guide ethical AI development practices and ensure responsible innovation across all products. Experience in AI ethics and product management essential.
responsibilities: Develop and implement ethical AI guidelines across product portfolio
Lead cross-functional teams in ethical design and development practices

Collaborate with legal, engineering, and research teams on compliance

skills: Deep understanding of AI ethics principles and frameworks
Strong product management and strategic thinking skills
Experience with regulatory compliance (GDPR, AI Act, etc.)
preferred: Background in philosophy, ethics, or related field
Publication or speaking experience in AI ethics

benefits: Competitive salary with significant equity upside
